overview:
Joe Abrahams is the Managing Director at the Calvin Group located in Culver City, California. After receiving his degree in Political Science from UC Berkeley and playing Division I Basketball Joe Abrahams decided that his love for people, competitive attitude and appreciation for conversation could best be utilized in the world of recruiting. By luck alone Joe ended up in the technical industry; the field that is spearheading a consumer revolution.

Joe Abrahams first job in the industry was at The Boylston Group in Los Angeles and after picking up on the craft of recruiting quickly he joined the Calvin Group and assumed the role of Managing Director. The Calvin Group is continuing to grow in size from an employee, client and candidate standpoint aiming to provide the most personal and unique recruiting experience in North America. Occupying a number of exclusive relationships on both the candidate and client sides of the market they are able to formulate long lasting, effective relationships for all who entertain The Calvin Groups services.
